example_messages.message: Help! Building collapse at 123 Main St. Multiple people trapped. Children and elderly present. Need rescue team urgently!
example_messages.description: Critical rescue situation with vulnerable populations

example_messages.message: Flood in downtown area near Central Park. About 50 families need evacuation. Water rising fast. Some elderly cannot move.
Medical emergency at Oak Street shelter. Woman in labor, no access to hospital. Need medical team immediately.
Over 100 people at Community Center with no food or water for 2 days. Children are crying. Please send supplies.
example_messages.description: Supply shortage affecting large group including children

example_messages.message: Fire spreading at apartment building on 5th Ave. Many families trapped on upper floors. Lots of smoke. Help please!
Elderly care home needs evacuation. Storm damaged building. 40 elderly residents, some wheelchair bound.
example_messages.description: Vulnerable population requiring special care during evacuation

example_messages.message: Refugee camp at border needs medical supplies. Outbreak of illness. Children sick. Doctor here but no medicine.
example_messages.description: Medical supply shortage in vulnerable population

example_messages.message: Heart attack victim at 789 Park Lane. Not breathing. Please hurry!!
example_messages.description: Critical medical emergency requiring immediate response

example_messages.message: School bus accident on Highway 10. About 30 children injured. Some serious. Need multiple ambulances now.
Homeless shelter lost power and heat. Freezing cold. 80 people including pregnant woman and babies need warm place.
